scenes.title: Anjana's Blessing
scenes.description: Anjana, a beautiful apsara, prays intensely. A celestial light bathes her as Vayu, the wind god, bestows his blessing, promising a powerful son, Hanuman.

scenes.title: Infant's Leap
scenes.description: Baby Hanuman, thinking the sun is a ripe fruit, leaps towards the sky. The vibrant orange sun fills the screen, a tiny figure hurtling towards it with innocent glee.

scenes.title: Indra's Thunderbolt
scenes.description: Indra, angered by Hanuman's attempt to seize the sun, strikes him with his Vajra. Hanuman plummets from the sky, a trail of golden dust marking his descent.

scenes.title: Broken Jaw
scenes.description: Hanuman lies unconscious on the earth, his jaw injured. Vayu, enraged by the attack on his son, withdraws the world's air, causing immense suffering.

scenes.title: Brahma's Boon
scenes.description: The gods, realizing their mistake, grant Hanuman powerful boons. Brahma restores him, making him invincible, his face radiating newfound strength.

scenes.title: The Forgotten Powers
scenes.description: Years pass, and Hanuman, now a devoted servant to Sugriva, has forgotten his immense power. He looks at Sugriva with unwavering loyalty, unaware of his own potential.

scenes.title: Rama's Ring
scenes.description: Rama entrusts Hanuman with his ring, a symbol of faith and hope. Hanuman clutches it tightly, a determined look spreading across his face.

scenes.title: The Mighty Leap
scenes.description: Hanuman, remembering his abilities, takes a colossal leap across the ocean. The ocean churns beneath him as he soars through the air, a silhouette against the vast expanse.

scenes.title: Meeting Sita
scenes.description: Hanuman finds Sita in Lanka, imprisoned and sorrowful. He presents Rama's ring, a spark of hope igniting in her weary eyes, tears streaming down her face.

scenes.title: Lanka Ablaze
scenes.description: Hanuman, captured by Ravana, sets Lanka ablaze with his tail. Flames engulf the city, a roaring inferno consuming everything in its path, a testament to his power.

scenes.title: Returning Victorious
scenes.description: Hanuman returns to Rama with news of Sita. He bows before Rama, conveying the message of Sita with utmost respect and humility.

scenes.title: The Sanjeevani Herb
scenes.description: Lakshmana is gravely wounded, and Hanuman flies to the Himalayas to retrieve the Sanjeevani herb. He carries the entire mountain back, his face strained with effort.

scenes.title: Lakshmana Revived
scenes.description: The Sanjeevani herb heals Lakshmana, who awakens revitalized. Rama embraces Hanuman with gratitude, acknowledging his unwavering devotion and strength.

scenes.title: Hanuman's Devotion
scenes.description: Hanuman tears open his chest, revealing Rama and Sita residing in his heart. Rama looks at Hanuman with love, emphasizing Hanuman's unparalleled devotion.

scenes.title: Eternal Service
scenes.description: Hanuman kneels before Rama, forever dedicated to his service. The screen fades to golden light, symbolizing his eternal devotion and unwavering loyalty, a true embodiment of faith.
